title: Study on the guidelines for the efficient and sustainable management of groundwater usage revenue collection in relation to groundwater usage fees and groundwater preservation fees in the groundwater crisis areas of Thailand
content:

Source: Environmental and Sustainability Indicators, Volume 23

Author(s): Vijitsri Sanguanwongse, Mana Luksamee-Arunothai, Supanee Hanphattananusorn, Kanokon Seemanon, Wasin Siwasarit, Setthabut Ittithumwinit
